questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe niyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kwumviriza no kugenzura ibikorwa vyabo.

questions.question: Ni ryari abanyeshure bategerezwa gusubiramwo ibikorwa vyakozwe n'umwigisha?
Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure kwicara mu gihe bagize ikimenyetso ntavuze "Simoni avuze"

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa gutuma abana bava mu bibanza vyabo bicaramwo

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa gurakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa kuvuga "Simoni avuze" kenshi cane mu gishingo kimwe

questions.question: Ni akahe karore k'ikibazo wotegerezwa kubaza abanyeshure mu kiganiro c'aka gakorwa?
answers: Ni gute twokoresha ubumenyi twize muri aka gakorwa kw'ishure canke i muhira?
Ni kubera iki ari ngirakamaro kumenya inyiyumvo zacu zitaraba?
Wibaza ko ari gute ibikorwa vyawe bikora ku nyiyumvo za bagenzawe buri musi?

questions.question: Ni gute wogira aka gakorwa akagumye ku banyeshure bakuze?
answers: Vuga amategeko mu gihe gusa abanyeshure bicaye.
